SELECT cr.*, u.work_id, u.name, u.avatar, u.department, u.mobile, u.status, u.last_active_time FROM dbo.contacts_relation cr JOIN dbo.[user] u ON cr.contact_id = u.id JOIN dbo.user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN dbo.role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE cr.user_id = #{userId} AND r.role_key != 'engineer'
AND (u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.work_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.department LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
GROUP BY cr.id, cr.user_id, cr.contact_id, cr.relation_type, cr.remark, cr.create_time, cr.update_time, u.work_id, u.name, u.avatar, u.department, u.mobile, u.status, u.last_active_time ORDER BY u.last_active_time DESC
